text: José Antonio Mora Otero (22 November 1897 - 26 January 1975) was a Uruguayan lawyer and politician. He was the secretary general of the Organization of American States between 16 January 1956 and 18 May 1968. He was Uruguay's Minister of Foreign Relations from 1971 to 1972.Biography (OAS) ==References== Category:1897 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Uruguayan politicians Category:Uruguayan lawyers Category:Secretaries General of the Organization of American States
title: José Antonio Mora
